sentences: Haruka Chisuga (千菅 春香, Chisuga Haruka, born January 23, 1992) is a Japanese voice actress and singer from Morioka, Iwate Prefecture affiliated with the agency Fortunerest.
As a singer, she is signed to Victor Entertainment under their label Flying Dog.
During her early childhood, Chisuga took classical piano lessons.
During high school, Chisuga decided to become a voice actress and singer after seeing a video of Nana Mizuki performing.
She was discovered in 2012 after winning the Miss Macross 30 contest, which was held to celebrate the 30th anniversary of the Macross franchise.
She played her first main role as Shizuka Sakaki in the 2014 anime television series Shirobako.
